text_block_list.text: A holiday afternoon. Walking through the shopping district, hungry and looking for a place to eat—

text_block_list.name: Chinese Restaurant Owner
text_block_list.text: It's overrrr!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, no, it's fi— wait, huh? Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well... apparently, lately, new shops have been popping up one after another in the neighborhood. If this keeps up, we'll have to close the shop...

text_block_list.name: Chinese Restaurant Owner
text_block_list.text: This old-fashioned shop just won't cut it anymore... You need a trendy shop that can capture the stomachs of the youth...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ........No way! It's not over yet!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because... for the pride of a restaurant girl! Emergency temporary poster girl + ace consultant, Omachi-Chan will turn this shop around!
choice_data_list: If that's the case, we need a strategy.
If that's the case, we need a strategy.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Of course, I've got that perfectly prepared! Its name... 'Insta-Worthy Menu Overload Strategy'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: If customers are flocking to new things, we'll counter with new menus too! We'll serve innovative, stylish dishes that look great on Umasta!

text_block_list.name: Chinese Restaurant Owner
text_block_list.text: Doing that is pointless...! It's like pouring water on a hot stone! I'm a loser...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Now, now, let's just give it a try! Come on, everyone together! Heave, ho, mmm!

text_block_list.name: Chinese Restaurant Owner
text_block_list.text: Mmmmmmm!!
And so, Matikanetannhauser began developing the 'Insta-Worthy Menu'. And a few days later, the first customer arrived—

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Excuse me—. ...Excuse me—? ...Is this shop open?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Excuse me—. ...Excuse me—? ...Is this shop open?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Welcome~! Come on in~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh, Tannhauser? What are you doing?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Hehe, well, let's set that aside for now... First, take a look at our shop's proud Insta-Worthy Menu.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...'Firecracker Frenzy Fry', 'Heaven and Hell Extreme Grill', 'High-Spec Master'... Wait, what kind of dishes are these!? Are they even dishes!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Um, I have no idea... Well, for now, just give me the recommendation...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...Huh? Liver and leeks?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And this is the 'Lava Flow Tofu Islands' and 'Dark Matter Searing Stir-fry'.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
......
Mapo tofu... and sweet and sour pork?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Wait, wait, wait! These are all just regular Chinese dishes!? The only thing wild is the names!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Guhhh!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ugh... So, to save the shop, I thought up innovative menu names, and that was fine until...!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: As the daughter of a teishokuya, you couldn't risk the flavor, so it ended up just being arranged menus... What a dilemma.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ugh... I guess I really can't break out of my ordinary shell after all~.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Now, now, don't be so pessimistic. First, let's eat what you made, then we can plan a new strategy—

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Munch munch... Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Wow! This is super delicious! It far exceeds my expectations...!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: See... it's not ordinary! You can do it, Tannhauser!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Chinese Restaurant Owner
text_block_list.text: Y-yes, with this flavor... This shop will be revived!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: R-really...!? Is that true...!?
choice_data_list: You broke out of your 'ordinary' shell!
You broke out of your 'ordinary' shell!
Now all that's left is to raise its popularity.
Now all that's left is to raise its popularity.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: R-really...!? Is that true...!?
choice_data_list: You broke out of your 'ordinary' shell!
You broke out of your 'ordinary' shell!
Now all that's left is to raise its popularity.
Now all that's left is to raise its popularity.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: W-w-well... But I just did it while remembering my family's flavors...
choice_data_list: Then, you should thank your parents.
Then, you should thank your parents.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That's right. Okay. Then I'll face my family's direction and offer a prayer of gratitude.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Mom and Dad... And since it'd be sad to leave my brother out, him too...
And then... the shop, thanks to Nice Nature promoting it on SNS, customers returned, and it was successfully saved, they say.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm. Indeed, first we must have them eat it, right~.

text_block_list.name: Chinese Restaurant Owner
text_block_list.text: ...That's it! Then how about using you, Omachi-Chan, as a mascot to attract customers!? Like a town revitalization mascot character!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I see~! Then then, for now, let's attach some wings... and say I was born from the sea——

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: N-no, no need, no need! More like, aren't you contradicting yourself right away!
It also seemed like the eccentric old man might be the cause of the shop's decline, but anyway, the taste of the new menu became popular, and the shop was saved.
